featured.title: A Critical Participatory Study of Body-Inclusive Embodied Activity
featured.description: 4-article dissertation project investigating (non)normative embodied expectations in schools, critical deconstruction of embodied activities, and youth co-designed framework for body-inclusive embodiment in schools.

featured.title: Re-Mediating Mixed-Reality for Kids with Disabilities
featured.description: Iteratively designed and facilitated mixed-reality embodied learning activities to enable multimodal participation, communication, and coordination for campers with communication disorders.

other.title: STEP / GEM-STEP / iSTEP / PLAE
other.description: Hybrid computational-embodied modeling with elementary students to understand scientific phenomena; technical lead, embodied model designer, GEMScript developer, and analysis lead on multiple papers.

other.title: RepTaL (Representations for Teachers as Learners)
other.description: Studying how elementary teachers think about representations in science teaching; supported analysis, writing, and journal revisions.

principles.title: Co-PIs
principles.details: Joshua Danish, Dionne Cross Francis, Cindy Hmelo-Silver, Heidi Carlone, & Noel Enyedy

other.title: Cities on the Edge of War
other.description: Semester-long board & role-playing game for undergraduates to explore the Peloponnesian War; supported data collection and analysis.

other.title: SEEDS with MEME
other.description: Facilitated 5-week implementations to help 5th graders use evidence to create and revise models of scientific phenomena; analyzed & published findings; developed agent-based simulations to serve as sources of scientific evidence.

principles.title: Co-PIs
principles.details: Joshua Danish, Cindy Hmelo-Silver, Clark Chinn, & Ravit Duncan

other.title: CIT Education Research
other.description: Evaluated and iterated instructional design for undergraduate computing courses; designed measures, analyzed performance data, and first-authored work on flipped/active learning.

other.title: FPG Child Development Institute (AFIRM & CSESA)
other.description: Supported ASD research via module/video development, survey design, and quantitative analyses for youth, adults, families, and community initiatives.

principles.title: Co-PIs
principles.details: Kara Hume, Jessica Dykstra Steinbrenner, & Ann Sam

other.title: Mindfulness in Human Development
other.description: Investigated effects of yoga and mindfulness in public middle schools; developed measures, coded data, and managed the 2019 Embodied Learning Summit.
